document.full_text: lenovo, the world's no.4 pc brand, expects its pc market share in western europe to rise from the current level of about 7 percent, helped by its acquisition of a german electronics firm, ceo yang yuanqing said on wednesday.
document.title: lenovo sees pc market share in western europe rising
lines_and_colors: lenovo, the world's no.4 pc brand, expects its pc market share in western europe to rise from the current level of about 7 percent, helped by its acquisition of a german electronics firm, ceo yang yuanqing said on wednesday.
